description: Integration task depends on core UI components being ready.
mitigation_plan: Develop components against a shared design spec.

description: Backend user service and auth guard depend on the Cognito infrastructure being provisioned.
mitigation_plan: DevOps to provide Cognito ARN and configuration details as soon as they are available.
impact_if_delayed: Cascading delay to all authentication and data persistence features (RISK-006).

description: Comprehensive E2E testing of offline sync can only begin after the feature is fully implemented on the frontend.
mitigation_plan: QA to develop test cases in parallel with development. Frontend to provide testable builds early.
impact_if_delayed: Delays final validation of a high-risk feature, potentially pushing out the release.

description: The backend API for orchestrating formula execution depends on the secure Lambda sandbox being deployed and available.
mitigation_plan: Implement the API against a mocked Lambda interface initially to allow for parallel work.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the entire custom mode execution feature.
